price: ពួកគេ(ម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់)បានតបថាៈ ផ្ទុយទៅវិញយើងបាន នាំមកឱ្យអ្នកនូវអ្វី(ទារុណកម្ម)ដែលពួកគេបានសង្ស័យចំពោះវា។
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
